response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. Given its exceptional features and benefits, it is valued at $15,000 by us. Considering its worth to you, we are offering it to you at this premium price. We believe this investment will provide significant value and return on your part. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information about the product.", "product_price": 15000}
